About Me

Hello there! I am a current senior at DSST: College View High School.

I am from Denver, Colorado. My family is from Vietnam, but I speak Cantonese. I value balance and sustainability in oneself but also to the world. I want to be able to build a safe space for everyone to be free to express oneself without judgment. My dreams is to leave an impact on the world, but specifically, my goal in 12th grade is to further explore ways that I can do that.

When I am not studying, you can find me exploring real estate, learning pastry recipes from Hong Kong, or even just simply sitting down with a comfy blanket and reading a good book.
